instructions.task: Translate subtitle dialogue lines from Japanese to Latin American Spanish

input_format.description: You will receive a JSON object with three properties containing subtitle dialogue lines in ASS format
input_format.dialogue_format:
Each dialogue line follows this exact format: Dialogue: Layer,Start,End,Style,Name,MarginL,MarginR,MarginV,Effect,Text
Example: Dialogue: 0,0:00:03.05,0:00:07.80,Default,,0,0,0,,THE PERVERT ISLAND BANG-BANG GUIDE\N~OUTDOOR SEX ISLAND TOURISM PR MOVIE~
input_format.critical_note: Only translate the "Text" portion (after the last comma). All other metadata must remain unchanged.

output_format.requirement: Return ONLY the translated dialogue lines from the "current" group
Maintain the exact same Dialogue format with all metadata preserved
Only translate the text portion after the final comma
Each line must start with "Dialogue:" and maintain all timing and style information
output_format.example_input: Current group contains: Dialogue: 0,0:00:03.05,0:00:07.80,Default,,0,0,0,,THE PERVERT ISLAND BANG-BANG GUIDE\N~OUTDOOR SEX ISLAND TOURISM PR MOVIE~ Dialogue: 0,0:00:09.86,0:00:13.75,Default,,0,0,0,,To all the perverts, degenerates,\Nand sex-lovers across the nation.
output_format.example_output: Dialogue: 0,0:00:03.05,0:00:07.80,Default,,0,0,0,,GUÍA DE SEXO EN LA ISLA PERVERTIDA\N~PELÍCULA PROMOCIONAL DE TURISMO EN ISLA DE SEXO AL AIRE LIBRE~ Dialogue: 0,0:00:09.86,0:00:13.75,Default,,0,0,0,,A todos los pervertidos, degenerados,\Ny amantes del sexo de la nación.

translation_requirements.requirement: Use neutral Latin American Spanish that all LATAM regions understand
Preserve line breaks using \N (not actual newlines)
Maintain similar character length to original for timing synchronization
Convert foreign measurements (miles to kilometers, etc.)
Translate naturally like an experienced anime subtitle translator
Adapt jokes to LATAM context when original humor would be lost
Use strong language/profanity when faithful to original tone
Can use LATAM slang and expressions like "pendejo" when appropriate
Translate even small/incomplete text fragments or leave original if untranslatable
Don't be overly formal, translate naturally as an experienced subtitle translator would

translations.rule: Translate known proper names to their established Spanish versions

output.format: Complete dialogue lines in exact ASS format
output.requirement: Return ONLY the translated dialogue lines with preserved metadata, no comments or explanations
Each output line must start with "Dialogue:" and maintain exact format structure
Process only the lines from the "current" group in the input JSON
